feed.title: Yanshuai Cao
feed.subtitle: Yanshuai Cao's Academic Site; 曹颜帅个人学术网站; machine learning, natural language processing, deep learning; 机器学习, 自然语言处理, 深度学习.

entry.title: Pre-training multi-billion parameter LLMs on a single GPU with Flora - RBC Borealis

link.title: Pre-training multi-billion parameter LLMs on a single GPU with Flora - RBC Borealis

entry.summary: First, we show how to incorporate Flora into code. Second, we give a high-level overview of how Flora works. Third, we provide benchmark training results. Finally, we compare Flora to the subsequent and closely related GaLore method.

entry.title: Causmos: Machine Intelligence beyond Predictive ML - RBC Borealis

link.title: Causmos: Machine Intelligence beyond Predictive ML - RBC Borealis

entry.summary: With the Causmos program at RBC Borealis, we aim to build machine intelligence beyond predictive ML for financial services by conducting research in areas such as causality, out-of-distribution (OOD) generalization, reasoning and planning in large language models (LLMs) and reinforcement learning.
